Author: Koenari
Name: Himbeertoni Raid Tool
Description: A collection of useful tools for RaidGroups, including loot management
Changelog:
New Feature: Manage multiple gear/bis sets per job
New Feature: Automatically updates own characters data (can be disabled in the config)
User Interface: Made it more pretty
User Interface: You can now hide jobs (select classes when editing a character)
General: Correctly handle materia for previous expansions
